title: Awesome Service
review:
Dear Team,

I had a wonderful Experience to order Trimmer.
If any Ratings have, I will give 10/10 

Thanks & Regards,
Amit Khaire

title: Classy product
review:
Good product.
Most important thing of this Trimmer is you can charge by your mobile charger(USB).

title: Useless product
review: Using Third party power source is violating of warranty terms and company specified  charger won't available anywhere.once order place no refund only replacement

title: Good machine
review:
I used it around 2 months. 
Pros-
Charging can last up to max 7 uses for 8-10 minute of every use.
Take 8 hours to charge for 1 amp charger.
very handy design.
Easy to clean due to no oil need.
can do without comb .5 mm looks like zero shave.
blades r sharp but very skin friendly.
Blade r wide than usual.
Cons-
No charger is provided.
Noisy operation if u were battery operated user it will irritate u firstly.
Cant use while charging so keep it charge before fully drain.

title: Utterly Disappointed
review: Take more time to charge and if put charge more than 8 hours can use only 15 mins..guys please think and buy this...

title: Just wow!
review: It very good and nice built quality for rs800.useful product to buy.only thing is it dont  have charging adapter has only USB cable.I just use the smartphone charger.

review: OK product, no charger provided, not mentioned in offer. Battery takes longer time to charge.

title: Waste of money!
review:
supply unit HQ80 for this trimmer is not available in india
after calling philips they do not recommend mobile charge to charge trimmer. 
very very bad trimmer. philips clearly mentions that do not use mobile charger to charge it. .and they do not provide charger. I can't expect it from Philips & flipkart .very disappointed. 
friends please don't buy it
